biotools.summary: GTestimate is a scRNA-seq normalization method. In contrast to other methods it uses the Simple Good-Turing estimator for the per cell relative gene expression estimation.

bioschemas.name: GTestimate
bioschemas.summary: GTestimate is a scRNA-seq normalization method. In contrast to other methods it uses the Simple Good-Turing estimator for the per cell relative gene expression estimation.
